column2: SELECT p.objID, f.id as FIRST_ID, f.ra as FIRST_ra, f.dec as FIRST_dec, p.ra as SDSS_ra, p.dec as SDSS_dec, p.mode, p.type, p.clean, --better of DeVaucouleurs/Exponential magnitude fit with errors p.modelMag_u, p.modelMag_g, p.modelMag_r, p.modelMag_i, p.modelMag_z, -- Stokes Q and U parameters with errors p.q_u, p.u_u, ----------------------------------------------------------------------- -- PhotoZ paramters - Photometrically estimated redshifts and distances pz.objID as pz_objid, pz.z as pz_z, pz.zErr, pz.distMod, pz.lumDist, -- Spectroscopic (SpecObjAll) parameters ----------------------------------------------------------------------- s.specObjID, s.bestObjID, s.z, s.zErr, s.sourcetype, s.class, s.subClass, -- Galaxy Spectroscopic Line (GalSpecLines) parameters ----------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Equivalent widths and errors gl.h_alpha_eqw, gl.h_alpha_eqw_err, -- Joining the various SDSS tables based on FIRST RA and Dec FROM MyDB.FIRST_Reduced_#p0#deg AS f OUTER APPLY dbo.fGetNearestObjEq (f.ra, f.dec, #) AS x JOIN PhotoObjAll p ON p.objID = x.objID LEFT JOIN PhotoZ pz ON pz.objID = p.objID LEFT JOIN SpecObjAll s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID LEFT JOIN GalSpecLine gl ON gl.specobjid = s.specobjid -- Setting conditions on the magnitudes according to SDSS filter magnitude limits WHERE p.modelMag_u< =# OR p.modelMag_g< =# OR p.modelMag_r< =# OR p.modelMag_z< =#
